page.title: 16A BOY'S DAY IN GRETTON
page.content: I am a boy of 12 and live on a farm just outside Cardington. I am going to tell you about a typical Saturday in my life. Normally when I get up at 8.30a.m. my dad has just come in from doing the milking. After breakfast I go outside and scrape the muck up with the tractor,then I bed the cubicles down with straw so that the cows don't get dirty. After dinner I help my dad to do odd jobs. About 3 o'clock I sneak into the house to listen to the football. At about 5 o'clock I fork out silage to the cows. After tea I don't usually do anything special,except perhaps watch T.V. I don't go to bed very early!
